name: Free Space
description:
Your boss has phoned. "An important mission" he said. "Tidy up the warehouse. Easy, just sort the boxes by colour. Important stuff there, you know, don't mess it up"...

"Don't mess it up". Easier said than done when the warehouse is full of dangerous cockroaches.

Controls:

Keyboard: - "WASD" to move

                   - Directional arrows to look around

                   - "Q" to grab/throw a box

                   - "Space" to dash

Gamepad: - Left stick to move

                   - Right stick to look around

                   - Bottom button to dash

                   - Left button to grab/throw a box

Enjoy :)
